ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: C mon guys, this is an easy one, you get the languages from your Class/level ... I ve picked up Gnoll, Lizard man, Barbarian, and a couple others as a Euradin
ygData.messageBody:
C'mon guys, this is an easy one, you get the languages from your Class/level
... I've picked up Gnoll, Lizard man, Barbarian, and a couple others as a
Euradin BEFORE i even left the isle. It has nothing to do with exposure.
Perhaps a Barbarian came thru Erudin, but i KNOW i never saw a gnoll before
i got Gnoll, and i have YET to see a lizardman.

Also, I played an enchanter to 10th level in beta, and the languages came
thru exactly the same for levels.

>
>Ok .. Hmm I'm Thinking because of the Different scenarios there can be
only one common thread . Exposure YES,
>but no to the creature, but the language???? Or Different creatures Use a
Group of languages So there are ones In
>Odus That would activate Gnoll maybe kerrians ..??
